title: Unable to open LoL
body:
I know there are tonnes of posts about this, but I haven't been able to find any solutions that work so far within, so here goes:

I'm unable to open the patcher if I run "lol.laucher.exe" or "lol.laucher.admin.exe" in the base League of Legends folder, it'll run the LoLLauncher.exe and rads_user_kernel.exe, but not LoLPatcher.exe. The same thing happens if I attempt to open the LoLLauncher.exe in the RADS section.
If I run LoLPatcher.exe directly, the patcher will open but will always say Calculating Differences with one file scanning, will never complete and eventually crash to Bug Splat.

I've tried reinstalling League, deleting the lolpatcher folder in RADS, attempting to repair when I run the patcher, disabling firewall and all anti-virus software.

Any suggestions would be appreciated.

replies.body: You're on Windows, but which version? Have you updated all relevant things on it, like service packs and/or security updates?

Scanned your machine lately ??

Sounds like something is messing with the patcher as it launches... Any error messages or does it just do nothing once you double click it ?
